title: Goldman's drop despite strong earnings signals search for new market leadership - Jeff Tomasulo
text:
Goldman's drop despite strong earnings signals search for new market leadership - Jeff Tomasulo 8:28pm BST - 06:22 
Vespula Capital's CEO also comments on Starbucks' move to close all U.S. stores for racial bias training in an interview with Reuters' Fred Katayama. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
